abstract.text: A request structure for adding catalog resources to a user’s library.
Additional properties/relationships of a playlist.
Represents the type of a rating for a content item in the Apple Music Catalog.
A collection of personal recommendations.
Structure containing the methods related to the Apple Music catalog.
A structure representing a station genre in the Apple Music API.
Additional property/relationship of an album.
An enumeration representing the different types of items that can be searched in the Apple Music catalog.
A protocol representing music items that can be fetched through a library search request.
A generic music item that may either contain an album, playlist or a station.
A collection of radio shows.
The top search suggestion types.
Possible types: Albums, RadioShows, Artists, Curators, MusicVideos, Playlists, RecordLabels, Songs, Stations.
A collection of curators.
Song properties your app uses as a filter for a library resource request.
Additional properties/relationships of an album.
A request that your app uses to fetch multiple resources from the user’s library
using their identifiers.
A request that your app uses to fetch items the user has recently added.
A response that contains items the user has recently added to their library.
A collection of artists.
An object that represents recommended resources for a user calculated using their selected preferences.
A request that your app uses to delete ratings for albums, songs,
playlists, music videos, and stations for content in the user’s iCloud library.
Additional properties/relationships of an artist.
Represents a playlist within a user’s music library.
The suggestion kinds to include in the results.
A structure representing an album from Apple Music’s 100 Best Albums list.
Additional property/relationship of a song.
A type alias representing a collection of songs for multiple artists.
Album properties your app uses as a filter for a library resource request.

A request structure for fetching data from an arbitrary Apple Music API endpoint.
A type alias representing a collection of songs for multiple playlists.
A generic music item to represent each of the catalog music items.

A protocol for URL components that can be used to construct URLs for API requests.
A suggested popular result for similar search prefix terms.

An object that contains results for a library search request.
A collection of stations.
A collection of user music items.

using a recommendations request.
A request structure for uploading data to an arbitrary Apple Music API endpoint.
Parameters used to play a music item in Apple Music.

playlists, music videos, and stations for content in the Apple Music catalog.

playlists, and music videos for content in the user’s iCloud library.

Music video properties your app uses as a filter for a library resource request.

using a equivalent request.

properties your app uses as a filter for a library resource request.

using their identifiers.
is a type alias for an array of
instances.

MusadoraKit: The ultimate companion to MusicKit.

protocol for Apple Music API authentication.

A view that displays an animated artwork with a dynamic mesh gradient background.

The response to a request for search suggestions.

items.

protocol, specifically for Apple Music API requests.

to indicate the type of library item for which you want to fetch ratings.

using a catalog chart request.
